    end
  end

  always @(posedge rd_clk) begin
    if (rd_resetn_in == 1'b0) begin
      rd_valid <= 1'b0;
    end else begin
      if ((rd_ready) && (rd_fsm_state == RD_READ_FROM_MEM)) begin
        rd_valid <= 1'b1;
      end else begin
        rd_valid <= 1'b0;
      end
    end
  end
